name: FIN_ASST_TRKR_FLAG_UPD_HX
description: This table contains the updates made to the flags of a financial assistance tracker record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the program tracker record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the flags that were on the tracker when the history was updated.
